alert.note: Alert for Inland Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:27PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pender County through 400 PM EDT... At 326 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near White Stocking, or near Burgaw, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Burgaw, White Stocking, Rocky Point, Murray Town, Ashton, St. Helena, Watha and Pender Memorial Hospital. This includes Interstate 40 between mile markers 389 and 409. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
